archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Energietransport besturen
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Het vermogen om stuuracties op netcomponenten te bepalen teneinde de energie te transporteren en de balans te handhaven. Inclusief reageren op verzoek andere netbeheerder, bv. activatie balancing van TenneT; Uitvoeren direct ingrijpen bij netuitval of technische congestie (incl. melden aan relevante netbeheerder bv. TenneT). NB: Het versturen van de acties zelf zit in C.2.1.4 of in C.6 (via de markt).

properties.value: The ability to determine control actions on grid components to keep energy flowing and maintain balance. Including responding to requests from other grid operators, e.g. activation balancing from TenneT; Implement immediate action in the event of grid failure or technical congestion (including reporting to relevant grid operator, e.g. TenneT). NB: Sending the control actions is part of C.2.1.4 or C.6 (via the market).
